description.value: An eyedrake's eyestalks are valued by magic users, enchanters and artificers. The eyestalks must be carefully separated from the wing-webbing between them. Once successfully harvested, roll 1d6 for the type of eyestalk received (1. Frost, 2. Sonic, 3. Telekinetic, 4. Fire, 5. Paralyzing, 6. Necrotic). [See FToG p199 for more details on the Eyedrake]
